content: Sept 9 Sterling Jewelers Inc  the largest U.S. jewelry retailer  must face a federal agency's claims that it failed to promote female employees and paid them less than men  a U.S. appeals court said on Wednesday.
name: Signet Jewelers Limited
title: UPDATE 1-Signet Jewelers unit must face gender bias claims -U.S. court
